snippet: Kindle Singles are works of long-form journalism that seek out that sweet spot between magazine articles and hardcover books.
abstract: Dwight Garner Critic's Notebook observes that Amazon's Kindle Singles are works of long-form journalism that seek out that sweet spot between magazine articles and hardcover books; notes that he read 15 of the nonfiction 'boutique minibooks,' pronouncing most of them blah, but a few were so good they seem almost like a new genre.
lead_paragraph: Kindle Singles are works of long-form journalism that seek out that sweet spot between magazine articles and hardcover books.

headline.main: Miniature E-Books Let Journalists Stretch Legs
